message.notenoughwands.building_wand.hea: Right click to extend blocks in that direction
message.notenoughwands.building_wand.gol: Sneak right click on such a block to undo one of the last two operations
message.notenoughwands.displacement_wand: Right click to push blocks forward
Sneak right click to pull blocks
message.notenoughwands.moving_wand.heade: Right click to take a block
message.notenoughwands.moving_wand.gold: Right click again on block to place it down
message.notenoughwands.swapping_wand.hea: Sneak right click to select a block
message.notenoughwands.swapping_wand.gol: Right click in empty air to select 'offhand' mode or right click on block to replace
message.notenoughwands.illumination_wand: Right click on block to spawn light
Right click on light to remove it again
message.notenoughwands.acceleration_wand: Right click on block to speed up ticks
Sneak right click to pull blocks
message.notenoughwands.capturing_wand.he: Left click on creature to capture it
message.notenoughwands.capturing_wand.go: Right click on block to respawn creature
message.notenoughwands.teleportation_wan: Right click to teleport forward until a block is hit or maximum distance is reached
